<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Bitmap Info</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/bitmaps/{numberOrInscriptionId}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get bitmap info by number or inscription ID.

## Request
